### Welcome to Kenia Soil Survey

The **Kenya Soil Survey (KSS)**, a department within [KALRO](https://www.kalro.org), provides authoritative soil information to support sustainable land management, agricultural planning, environmental monitoring, and national development.  
:::

Our mission is to generate, curate, and share high-quality soil data and knowledge for researchers, policymakers, farmers, and the public.


## Contents of this Site:

Access datasets collected from soil survey missions across Kenya. Predicted distribution of soil properties (soil maps) and Soil health indicators, such as erosion risk, fertility, crop suitability.
